headline: Oregon Festival Hires An Intimacy Director
abstract: Sarah Lozoff is joining one of the nationâ€™s leading regional theaters for all 11 of its productions in its 2020 season.
lead_paragraph: Just a few years ago, intimacy direction was such a new practice in the theater that hiring someone to choreograph sex scenes was almost unheard of. Then along came #MeToo, and awareness rapidly began to shift. By last summer, intimacy direction was on Broadway.
